data.name: Microsoft Power Platform Webinar Series
data.description:
Learn more about the Microsoft Power Platform and use cases in this interactive webinar from the experts. About this Event In this Power Platform webinar series, we will discuss and walk-through a live demonstration of how best to use your Power Apps, Power Automate and Power BI.

relatedRecords.name: M365 Philly (AKA SPS Philly)
relatedRecords.description: Administrators, end-users, architects, developers, and other professionals that work with Microsoft Collaboration or Cloud Technologies will meet to share the latest information for working with SharePoint, Microsoft365, the Power Platform and related offerings from Microsoft.

relatedRecords.name: NE RPC
relatedRecords.description: NE RPC is a community-organised, free-to-attend virtual conference, showcasing speakers from the North East of England. We’ll be hosting a day of 30-minute talks, covering a wide variety of tech subjects. Whether bleeding-edge or tried-and-tested, we’re listening!
